articles.title: Rainbow Rollers
articles.contents:
Rainbow Rollers
          
          
          Artists
          Events
          Zines
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Rainbow Rollers
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Who We Are
            A welcoming group of queer printmakers supporting each
            other and our community! We are currently a small group of
            artists who each work independently to design and print art
            by hand. We’ve teamed up to showcase our work at local pride
            festivals and markets in the Western Mass/Southern Vermont
            and New Hampshire region.
            
            
            What We Make
            Our pieces are hand made using techniques like silk
            screen, copper plate etching (intaglio), letterpress,
            linocut, and more. Each artist in our group has their own
            style and preferred mediums. We range from making fine art
            prints to t-shirts designed and screenprinted by hand at
            First Proof Press (a community printmaking studio in
            Brattleboro, Vermont) or at our home studios!
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Rainbow Rollers

              Events
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Upcoming Events
            
            Queer
            Joy Fun Fair
            When: June 8 2025, 3-6pm
            Where: Smith Vocational High School 80
            Locust St, Northampton, MA
            We will have a booth selling artist-made prints,
            letterpress cards, screen-printed shirts and bandanas!
            Rainbow Rollers: Izzy Snyder &
            Margaret Janiczek
            
            
            
            Past Events
            Hampshire Pride, Northampton, MA May 3, 2025 Izzy Snyder,
            Margaret Janiczek, Delaney Dumm

articles.title: Rainbow Rollers: Artist-made prints and apparel handprinted in Brattleboro, VT
articles.contents:
Rainbow Rollers
          
          
          Artists
          Events
          Zines
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Rainbow Rollers: Artist-made prints and apparel
handprinted in Brattleboro, VT
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Who We Are
            A welcoming group of queer printmakers supporting each
            other and our community!
            
            
            What We Make
            Our pieces are hand made using techniques like silk
            screen, copper plate etching (intaglio), letterpress,
            linocut, and more. Each artist in our group has their own
            style and preferred mediums. We range from making fine art
            prints to t-shirts designed and screenprinted by hand at
            First Proof Press (a community printmaking studio in
            Brattleboro, Vermont) or at our home studios!
            
            
            Zines for good!
            We are embarking on a collaborative project to make mini coloring book zines featuring
            designs from local queer artists! We will be selling them at
            upcoming markets, and all funds will be donated to the AIDS
            Project of Southern Vermont.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Rainbow Rollers: Artist-made prints and apparel
handprinted in Brattleboro, VT

              We are embarking on a collaborative project to make mini coloring book zines featuring

              AIDS
              Project of Southern Vermont.

articles.title: Queer Joy Coloring Zine
articles.contents:
Rainbow Rollers
          
          
          Artists
          Events
          Zines
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Queer Joy Coloring Zine
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Queer Joy Coloring Zine: Volume 1
            We are excited to produce our first little
            coloring-book-zine!
            Featuring art donated by 6 artists, with ALL funds raised
            from zine purchases going to the AIDS
            project of Southern VT. Zines will be available at our
            upcoming events.
            Artists:
            Ray Baehr - cavetoonist.com
            Margaret Janiczek - rootahdah.com
            EJ Jones
            Sasha Luci - Sasha’s
            Treehouse
            Izzy Snyder - @izzysnyder2001
            Shea Witzo - @sheawitzo
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Queer Joy Coloring Zine
